offerings: General language teaching: French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, and Russian.
centerInfo.cecrNote: Training focused on modern and effective teaching methods, as well as curricula meeting the requirements of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR).
centerInfo.fileDesc: Once the learner's registration is formalized (by signing a contract between the learner and CEIL), training will be provided on a weekly basis of six (06) hours, divided into two sessions (oral and written) of one and a half hours each.
fileItems: Registration form filled and signed as required
Commitment contract, read, approved and signed

enrollment.registrationFormDesc: All fields must be filled with correct and accurate information, signed and certified. Any false information may lead to cancellation of registration.
enrollment.commitmentContractDesc: The contract must be carefully read and all its terms approved before signing. The learner commits to regular attendance and respect of the center's internal regulations.
conditionsList: The candidate must be a university student, professor, administrative employee, or external person
Payment of registration fees before the start of training
Commitment to regular attendance (frequent absences may lead to exclusion)
Respect of the center's and university's internal regulations
warningsList: Unjustified absence of more than 3 consecutive sessions leads to permanent exclusion
Registration fees are non-refundable in case of withdrawal after training begins
Group or schedule changes after the session starts are only possible in exceptional cases
All original documents must be brought during actual registration
Any behavior contrary to internal regulations may subject the learner to disciplinary sanctions
notesList: Training duration: 60 hours distributed over two weekly sessions (oral and written)
Each session lasts one and a half hours (1h30)
Assessment is continuous throughout the training period
The certificate is only delivered to learners who successfully complete the training
enrollment.acceptTerms: I acknowledge that I have read and understood all the above terms and warnings and I agree to them
enrollment.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms to proceed
enrollment.clickToView: Click to view details and terms

centerInfo.officialLinks: Ministry of Higher Education & Official Platforms
centerInfo.contactDesc: For any inquiry or information request, please contact us via the form or the information below.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our story, mission, and the passionate team behind our language platform
about.storyP1: The Intensive Language Teaching Center (CEIL) at Kasdi Merbah University Ouargla was founded to provide high-quality, accessible language education for students, professors, staff, and the general community.
about.storyP2: The center combines modern technology with proven teaching methodologies to deliver an immersive learning experience. Our team of experienced and language-passionate educators work to develop courses that make learning a new language enjoyable and rewarding.
about.missionDesc: To provide accessible, high-quality language education that empowers learners to connect with the world.
about.valuesDesc: We believe in fostering a supportive community where every learner can thrive and achieve their goals.
about.excellenceDesc: We are committed to delivering exceptional learning experiences through innovative methods and dedicated instructors.

director.welcomeLabel: Welcome Message from the Center Director
director.name: Prof. Dr. Ahmed Mohammedi
director.title: Welcome to the Intensive Language Teaching Center
director.message1: I am pleased to welcome you to the Intensive Language Teaching Center (CEIL) at the University of El-Oued. Since its establishment, the center has strived to provide high-quality language education that meets the aspirations of students, professors, staff, and the wider community.
director.message2: We are committed to providing a modern learning environment based on effective pedagogical methods and internationally recognized standards, in accordance with the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR). Our team of specialized and passionate instructors works tirelessly to ensure a rich and rewarding learning experience.
director.message3: We invite you to discover our diverse programs and join our educational community. Together, we build bridges to the world through languages.
director.role: Director of the Intensive Language Teaching Center
director.highlightQuote: Together, we build bridges to the world through languages

footer.description: Your gateway to mastering new languages with professional instruction and flexible schedules for all levels.
footer.aboutDesc: The Intensive Language Teaching Center offers high-quality language training based on European standards, open to all ‚Äî students, professors, and staff.
